name: romp

Add to word list
Add to word list
to play or run in a happy, excited, and noisy way: The puppy and children romped together in the yard.
To romp is also to succeed or win easily: The unbeaten Charlottesville Crackers romped past the Beantown Beanies 68-26.
something that, in a noisy way, makes you feel happy and excited: The film is a comic romp.
A romp is also an easy victory over an opponent: Nothing could stop his romp to the nomination.
